attributes.action: Ensure that  the Church of England confines itself to using one Prayer Book only!.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment the Church of England has several versions of the Prayer Book in use in its churches. I have been to three churches this weekend all in the same diocese and the Communion Services were   in three different books! It would be far simpler for all of us if there was one Prayer Book only so we could follow it whichever church we visited.This also applies to the Church of England overseas.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
